divs: Sighting DetailsI was leaving to go to work as a turned on the main street i saw something on the right hand side of the passenger window,i looked again and noticed that it was quit weard,it kind of scared me i pulled to the center of the island on the road and got out to look at it,It looked like a huge circle of murcury just floating in the sky i looked at some cars driving by and felt like i was looking kind of stupid as i got back in my car turned it around cause i wanted to go home and get my camera it went away....when i got to work i told my friend kirk and he started laughing but then realized that i wasent joking,i also told my wife i called her from a payphone at work and she believed me,till this day i have no fkn clue what it was but i know one thing for sure it was not a plane a baloon or a blimp,i mean ive looked at mercury before and thats what this looked like in the air.I am a trae believer and am sick and tired of the government not having the balls to tell the world what is really going on, Thank You Moe
Summary: It looked like mercury in the sky
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Mississauga
There were no other sightings in Mississauga on or around July 18th 2001
